mapper.select: SELECT BR.brno, S.name as name, S.bas_addr, MIN(SC.sdt) as sdt, MAX(SC.edt) as edt, BR.cnt, BS.flag, BR.cdt, S.x, S.y FROM busk B, busk_req BR, busk_stag BS,stag_sche SC, sup S WHERE B.bno=BR.bno AND BR.brno=BS.brno AND BS.ssno=SC.ssno AND SC.sno = S.sno AND BR.bno=#{bno} AND SUBSTR(SC.sdt,1,10) = #{date} GROUP BY BS.brno

SELECT BR.brno, S.name as name, S.bas_addr as addr, MIN(SC.sdt) as sdt, MAX(SC.edt) as edt, BR.cnt, BS.flag, BR.cdt, S.x, S.y FROM busk B, busk_req BR, busk_stag BS,stag_sche SC, sup S WHERE B.bno=BR.bno AND BR.brno=BS.brno AND BS.ssno=SC.ssno AND SC.sno = S.sno AND BS.flag=#{flag} GROUP BY BS.brno limit #{rowNo}, #{size}
SELECT PS.psno, PS.sdt, PS.edt, PS.cdt, PS.addr, PS.x, PS.y, PS.shopname, PS.cdt, PS.cnt, B.name as buskname ,B. genre FROM per_sche PS, busk B WHERE PS.bno = B.bno AND PS.psno=#{value}

SELECT BS.brno, BR.cdt, S.name, S.x, S.y, S.genre, S.tel, S.bas_addr, S.det_addr, S.etc, S.sno, MAX(SC.edt) as edt , MIN(SC.sdt)as sdt FROM busk_req BR, busk_stag BS, stag_sche SC, sup S WHERE BR.brno=BS.brno AND BS.ssno=SC.ssno AND SC.sno=S.sno AND BS.brno=#{value} GROUP By BS.brno

SELECT BR.brno, SC.ssno, S.bas_addr as addr, S.x, S.y, S.name, MIN(SC.sdt) as sdt, MAX(SC.edt) as edt, B.name as teamname, B.genre FROM busk B, busk_req BR, busk_stag BS,stag_sche SC, sup S WHERE B.bno=BR.bno AND BR.brno=BS.brno AND BS.ssno=SC.ssno AND SC.sno = S.sno AND BS.flag=2
AND CURRENT_DATE <= SC.sdt AND CURRENT_DATE+1 > SC.sdt
AND S.bas_addr LIKE CONCAT('%',#{city},'%')
GROUP BY BS.brno

SELECT b.name, ss.sdt, ss.edt FROM stag_sche as ss, busk_stag as bs, busk_req as br, busk as b WHERE ss.ssno = bs.ssno and bs.brno=br.brno and br.bno=b.bno and ss.sno =#{no} and sdt LIKE '#{date}%' AND bs.flag=2
select PS.shopname, PS.addr, PS.sdt, PS.edt from per_sche PS, busk B where PS.bno = B.bno and B.bno=#{no} and substr(PS.sdt,1,10)>=substr(now(),1,10)

SELECT S.name, S.bas_addr,S.det_addr, MIN(SS.sdt) AS sdt, MAX(SS.edt) AS edt FROM busk B, busk_req BR, busk_stag BS,stag_sche SS, sup S WHERE B.bno=BR.bno AND BR.brno=BS.brno AND BS.ssno=SS.ssno AND SS.sno=S.sno AND B.bno=#{no} AND BS.flag=2 and substr(SS.sdt,1,10)>=substr(now(),1,10) GROUP BY BS.brno
select PS.psno, PS.shopname, PS.addr, PS.sdt, PS.edt, PS.cnt, PS.cdt, PS.x, PS.y from per_sche PS, busk B where PS.bno = B.bno limit #{rowNo}, #{size}

SELECT BR.brno, S.name as name, S.bas_addr as addr, MIN(SC.sdt) as sdt, MAX(SC.edt) as edt, BR.cnt, BS.flag, BR.cdt, S.x, S.y, B.genre FROM busk B, busk_req BR, busk_stag BS,stag_sche SC, sup S WHERE B.bno=BR.bno AND BR.brno=BS.brno AND BS.ssno=SC.ssno AND SC.sno = S.sno AND BS.flag=2 GROUP BY BS.brno limit #{rowNo}, #{size}

SELECT BR.brno, S.name as name, S.bas_addr as addr, MIN(SC.sdt) as sdt, MAX(SC.edt) as edt, BR.cnt, BS.flag, BR.cdt, S.x, S.y FROM busk B, busk_req BR, busk_stag BS,stag_sche SC, sup S WHERE B.bno=BR.bno AND BR.brno=BS.brno AND BS.ssno=SC.ssno AND SC.sno = S.sno AND BR.bno=#{no} GROUP BY BS.brno limit #{rowNo}, #{size}

SELECT b.name, b.genre, b.tel, b.lcnt, b.bno, br.cont, br.brno, ss.sdt, ss.edt, bs.flag, ss.ssno from busk as b, busk_req as br, busk_stag as bs, stag_sche as ss where b.bno=br.bno and br.brno = bs.brno and bs.ssno = ss.ssno and br.brno=#{no}

(select b.name, ps.addr, ps.sdt,ps.edt, b.bno from per_sche as ps, busk as b where ps.bno = b.bno AND ps.sdt>=now())
UNION ALL
(select b.name, concat(s.bas_addr,' ',s.det_addr)as addr, ss.sdt,ss.edt, b.bno from busk_stag as bs, busk as b, sup as s, stag_sche as ss, busk_req as br where bs.ssno=ss.ssno and bs.brno=br.brno and ss.sno=s.sno and br.bno=b.bno AND ss.sdt>=now() AND bs.flag='2')
ORDER BY sdt
mapper.update:
UPDATE busk_stag SET flag='2' WHERE ssno in
#{no}
mapper.select: select ss.ssno, ss.sdt, ss.edt from stag_sche ss LEFT outer join busk_stag bs ON ss.ssno = bs.ssno where bs.ssno is null and ss.sno = #{no} and ss.sdt LIKE CONCAT(#{date},'%') group by ss.ssno order by ss.sdt

SELECT BR.brno, S.name as name, S.bas_addr as addr, MIN(SC.sdt) as sdt, MAX(SC.edt) as edt, BR.cnt, BS.flag, BR.cdt, S.x, S.y FROM busk B, busk_req BR, busk_stag BS,stag_sche SC, sup S WHERE B.bno=BR.bno AND BR.brno=BS.brno AND BS.ssno=SC.ssno AND SC.sno = S.sno AND BR.bno=#{no} AND BS.flag=#{flag} GROUP BY BS.brno limit #{rowNo}, #{size}

select count(*) FROM (SELECT b.name, b.genre, min(ss.sdt) as sdt, max(ss.edt)as edt, br.cnt, bs.flag, br.cdt, br.brno from busk_stag as bs, stag_sche as ss, busk as b, busk_req as br where bs.ssno = ss.ssno and bs.brno=br.brno and br.bno=b.bno and ss.sno=#{no} GROUP BY br.brno)as b

select count(*) FROM (SELECT b.name, b.genre, min(ss.sdt) as sdt, max(ss.edt)as edt, br.cnt, bs.flag, br.cdt, br.brno from busk_stag as bs, stag_sche as ss, busk as b, busk_req as br where bs.ssno = ss.ssno and bs.brno=br.brno and br.bno=b.bno and ss.sno=#{no} and flag=#{flag} GROUP BY br.brno)as b
